body.name: Certified Refurbished Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 17. Order within 8 hrs 4 mins
features: A Certified Refurbished Ring Video Doorbell is refurbished, tested, and certified to look and work like new and comes with the same limited warranty as a new device. Certified Refurbished Amazon devices may be packaged in generic Amazon-branded boxes.
1080p HD video doorbell with enhanced features that let you see, hear, and speak to anyone from your phone, tablet, or PC.
An update from the original Ring Video Doorbell, enjoy improved motion detection, privacy zones and audio privacy, and crisper night vision.
Receive mobile notifications when anyone presses your doorbell or triggers your built-in motion sensors.
Powered by the built-in rechargeable battery or connects to existing doorbell wires for constant power.
Easily setup by connecting your Ring Video Doorbell to wifi through the Ring app and mounting with the included tools.
With a Ring Protect Plan (subscription sold separately), record all your videos, review what you missed for up to 60 days, and share videos and photos.
Pair with select Alexa-enabled devices to enable announcements and two-way talk for convenient in-home monitoring.

productInformation.name: Video
productInformation.value: 1080p HD Video, Live View, Night Vision

productInformation.name: Motion detection
productInformation.value: Advanced Motion Detection with adjustable motion zones

productInformation.name: Power
productInformation.value: Runs on a built-in rechargeable battery. Can be hardwired to an existing doorbell system or transformer for continuous charging (8-24 VAC, 40VA max, 50/60Hz). No halogen or garden-lighting transformers; no DC transformer/power supply.

productInformation.name: Box includes
productInformation.value: Ring Video Doorbell (2nd Generation), micro USB charging cable, mounting bracket (only compatible with Ring Video Doorbell (2nd Generation), user manual, security sticker, and installation tools and hardware

productInformation.name: Setup requirements
productInformation.value: Only if wiring in: Standard doorbell system with 8-24 VAC, 40 VA max, 50/60Hz doorbell transformer Ring Video Doorbell (2nd Generation) comes with a new mounting bracket in the box. Ring Video Doorbell (2nd Generation) is not compatible with other Ring mounting brackets.

productInformation.name: Warranty and service
productInformation.value: 1-year limited warranty. Use of Ring Video Doorbell is subject to the terms found here. This device receives the same limited warranty as a new device. Learn more about Certified Refurbished Amazon devices.

productInformation.name: Support
productInformation.value: Click here to view more information on the Ring Video Doorbell support page

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is the first camera, doorbell I have purchased and I am quite pleased with it. It was easy to install and set up and integrates quite easily with other Amazon products. The day images are in color with nice crisp quality. The night time images are not quite as clean and they come out in black and white. The night videos are distinguishable and they do the job. I live in a condo complex and this camera lets me know what is going on in my area. I find this helpful.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Well made. Easy to install. Nice clear video.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Complete doorbell kit.
reviews.reviewText: My refurbished ring doorbell came well packaged, not in the original packaging. It came with instructions and mounting hardware. My doorbell looked and performs just as new. No issues so far. If you are upgrading from a gen1 to a gen2, than you need to know that the mounting bracket is different between the two, other than that all is good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars AMAZING Camera Door Bell
reviews.reviewText: I love in a residential building and they have been stealing packages. I also run a business from home. My work area is all the way in the back and at times I cannot hear my door bell or when they knock. I love that I do not have to open the door if it is an unknown person knocking. I can see when my shipments are being delivered. Or if someone wanted to steal my packages. Their plans are very affordable monthly. I honestly feel safer with having the camera at my door. It really does make things easier and convenient if I am not home to get my packages. I can speak and hear through the device which is awesome. Thank you for this amazing device.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good value. Looks good, works great!
reviews.reviewText: Good value. Video quality and motion detection both improved over the earlier version.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Easy to install because wiring is not needed for the battery styles. Charging is needed about every 5 weeks. Picture on internet displayed on cell phone is clear.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: WORKS GREAT WITH OTHER RING PRODUCTS

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great product. I love itAny to mount
